title: 3a XL no option to add esim despite being on Android 11
content: Bought a pixel 3a XL phone from Amazon in the UAE but the + symbol does not appear next to the mobile network. The local operator etisalat supports esims as I have used on a previous pixels. 'Esim support checker' app says hardware supports esim, is there an option to enable second sim somewhere?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
